Networking.UDP

Class NetworkThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • Networking.UDP.NetworkThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class NetworkThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    A class for running a thread in the background for multiplayer access. Note, Only compatable with Hardware Accelerated games.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NetworkThread(UDPNetworkClass networkSide, AGame game, byte[] averageDataSize, UDPServerListener listener)
      The normal constructor for a NetworkThread.

    • Method Summary

      void start()
      Stars the thread.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NetworkThread

        public NetworkThread(UDPNetworkClass networkSide,
             AGame game,
             byte[] averageDataSize,
             UDPServerListener listener)
        The normal constructor for a NetworkThread.
        Parameters:
        networkSide - A server or Client this thread will be running.
        game - the game this thread will be running in
        averageDataSize - an average byte package which will be sent or recieved.
        listener - An event listener which will be notified that something has been recieved and be given the data.
